short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension designed to let you customize your new tab experience by giving you control over what you see, and how you search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable new tab extension for Google Chrome. It includes customizable backgrounds from several sources, including your own local images, custom search bar so you can search wherever you feel comfortable, as well as a shortcut section so you can quickly access the sites the matter to you the most.
